alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 8:55AM CDT until March 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River At Montgomery affecting Dallas, Montgomery, Elmore, Lowndes and Autauga Counties. Alabama River At R.F. Henry Lock and Dam affecting Lowndes, Autauga and Dallas Counties. Alabama River At Selma affecting Dallas County. .Flooding continues on the Alabama River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River At R.F. Henry Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to early Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 114.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 122.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 122.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
